MS MCQs

    Use developer tools to extend the Power Platform

    »

    1. What is the tool that we use to maintain our application customizations in XML files that can be packed and unpacked for usage in source control solutions?

      Package Deployer

      Plugin Registration Tool

      Solution Packager


    2. What language framework do we use for Plug-in development?

      .NET

      Node.js

      Java


    3. When would you use the Package Deployer?

      To install a Dataverse solution as a mobile application.

      To facilitate installation of one or more solutions, along with any configuration data, into a Dataverse environment.

      To facilitate installation of one or more solutions, along with any configuration data, into a desktop application.
